p: In summary, the findings presented here shows that the H 2O 2/LPO/(SCN -/I -) system robustly inactivates a wide range of influenza viruses that are the major circulating serotypes and species causing epidemics and are also components of the annual influenza vaccine. These results are very encouraging considering the likely contribution of this mechanism to in vivo influenza clearance and its potential as a target for pharmaceutical intervention.
